columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the redis instance at the time the operation was called. Valid values are: 'Creating', 'Deleting', 'Disabled', 'Failed', 'Linking', 'Provisioning', 'RecoveringScaleFailure', 'Scaling', 'Succeeded', 'Unlinking', 'Unprovisioning', and 'Updating'.

columns.name: redis_version
columns.description: Specifies the version.

columns.name: enable_non_ssl_port
columns.description: Specifies whether the non-ssl Redis server port (6379) is enabled.

columns.name: host_name
columns.description: Specifies the name of the redis host.

columns.name: minimum_tls_version
columns.description: Specifies the TLS version requires to connect.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the redis non-SSL port.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Indicates whether or not public endpoint access is allowed for this cache. Valid values are: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: The size of the Redis cache to deploy.

columns.name: sku_family
columns.description: The SKU family to use.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The type of Redis cache to deploy.

columns.name: ssl_port
columns.description: Specifies the redis SSL port.

columns.name: subnet_id
columns.description: The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the Redis cache in.

columns.name: static_ip
columns.description: Specifies the statis IP address. Required when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

columns.name: replicas_per_master
columns.description: The number of replicas to be created per master.

columns.name: shard_count
columns.description: The number of shards to be created on a premium cluster cache.

columns.name: access_keys
columns.description: The keys of the Redis cache.

columns.name: linked_servers
columns.description: A list of the linked servers associated with the cache.

columns.name: instances
columns.description: A list of the Redis instances associated with the cache.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: A list of private endpoint connection associated with the specified redis cache.

columns.name: redis_configuration
columns.description: Describes the redis cache configuration.

columns.name: tenant_settings
columns.description: A dictionary of tenant settings.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
